title: Total lobbying spending U.S. 1998 to 2019
summary: In general Spending in billion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Spending in billion U.S. dollars is gradually increasing from 1999 to 2008, roughly constant from 2008 to 2016, and lastly roughly increasing from 2016 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2007 and 2008.
The highest Spending in billion U.S. dollars, of value 3.51 was reached at Year 2010
Minimum Spending in billion U.S. dollars about 1.44 was reached at Year 1999
